posts.subject: If legal requirements are strict, anonymity through onion routing is impossible
posts.body: Let me prove this. If anyone who lets CP pass through their computer without storing logs is guilty, then relays are impossible. Because even when there aren't exit nodes, the police can set a hidden service that serves CP, and then whoever acts as a relay for that hidden service is v&. The only way you could possibly defeat this is by spreading a shit ton of routing devices across the city leeching off free wifi or something.Let me prove this. If anyone who lets CP pass through their computer without storing logs is guilty, then relays are impossible. Because even when there aren't exit nodes, the police can set a hidden service that serves CP, and then whoever acts as a relay for that hidden service is v&. The only way you could possibly defeat this is by spreading a shit ton of routing devices across the city leeching off free wifi or something.
